name: Current Account Business
details: Perform your financial transaction with pride and convenience. With People’s Current Account, you can obtain credit facilities fast, to suit your requirements. You can encash cheques from the widest network of branches & issue cheques which are as good as cash when you open a People’s Current Account. You also have the convenience of immediate encashment of cheques from any branch and apply for overdraft facilities. That’s not all, operating a People’s Current Account gives you access to a host of other benefits such as, the ability to deposit cash from our CDMs 24/7 days, and to enjoy the convenience of self banking, mobile, internet & voice banking services. Special benefits Special benefits: Convenience of immediate encashment of cheques from any branch Quick cheque realization Customized Cheque Books Ability to apply for overdraft facilities Enjoy the convenience of self banking, mobile, internet & voice banking services An internationally valid debit card is on offer to access your account Deposit cash from our CDMs 24X365
